## connectRemotePlaywright() function

Connects to a remote assistive-playwright-server running at the given URL and returns the chromium, firefox and webkit playwright browser type objects allowing to start and control those browsers remotely.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function connectRemotePlaywright(url: string | URL): RemotePlaywright;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string \| URL | URL at which assistive-playwright-server is running. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RemotePlaywright](./assistive-playwright-client.remoteplaywright.md)

## Remarks

This function is used internally by [createVM()](./assistive-playwright-client.createvm.md) to give access to the browsers in the virtual machine through the playwright API.
